text: Gilberto Kassab ( or ; born 12 August 1960 in São Paulo) was the mayor of São Paulo, the biggest city in Brazil. He is a member of the right-wing Democrat party. Kassab became famous when he brought in laws to stop billboard advertising, which he said were "visual pollution". ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of São Paulo Category:Democrats (Brazil) politicians
title: Gilberto Kassab
